name: Unmodified structure
description: No measures have been taken to improve the structural integrity of the ship. the ship is vulnerable and can't take much damage.

name: Basic structure
description: Improved alloys and supporting installation increase the durability of the ship.

name: Supported structure
description: Additional to the modern material, the ships structural integrity is also supported using force fields.

name: Enhanced structure
description: More efficient force fields and advanced materials make this structure quite durable.

name: Reinforced structure
description: The massive use of energy extends the durability of used materials beyond their natural maximum.
